original_text: And it came to pass, when Moses had made an end of writing the words of this law in a book, until they were finished,
korean_text: 모세가 이 율법의 말씀을 다 책에 써서 마친 후에

sentences.original_text: when Moses had made an end of writing the words of this law in a book,
sentences.korean_translation: 모세가 이 율법의 말씀을 책에 기록하기를 마쳤을 때,
